query:
SELECT email, status, role FROM users WHERE email IN (
    'vantaggiosleale@gmail.com',
    'andrea.vaturi@gmail.com',
    'chiara.babini@gmail.com',
    'mirko.castignani@gmail.com',
    'andrea.pula@gmail.com'
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oHtB2ru8zC82QY.root --database K4zM37evGzfMf8m3Ckfnqp --execute SELECT email, status, role FROM users WHERE email IN (
    'vantaggiosleale@gmail.com',
    'andrea.vaturi@gmail.com',
    'chiara.babini@gmail.com',
    'mirko.castignani@gmail.com',
    'andrea.pula@gmail.com'
);
